<title level="1" right="Rules">[Navigating an Urban Grid](/Rules.aspx?ID=1822)</title>

**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 541

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
You can simulate travel in a settlement using the Urban Grid to approximate distances. Since moving through a settlement requires a character to follow twisting roads, navigate crowds, or endure minor distractions along the way, it takes 15 minutes to move from one lot to an adjacent lot, or to cross a border (including exiting the settlement). If the settlement has [Paved Streets](/KMStructures.aspx?ID=47), this travel time is reduced to 5 minutes. Crossing a Water Border that doesn't have a [Bridge](/Rules.aspx?ID=8) takes an hour.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
